resources.string: Please enable the necessary \"Notification access\" option for the app. This permission is required for the app to work properly.
Failed to open notification permission settings. Please allow app to access notifications manually in Android settings.

How to setup

  1. Notification access. Enable "Notification access" for the app in Android settings.
  2. Enable AA developer mode. Go to the Android Auto app settings. Tap the Version and permission info section 10 times.
  3. Enable AA unknown sources. Select Developer settings from Android Auto overflow menu. Enable "Unknown sources'.

How to use

  1. Open Yandex Music app and play a track.
  2. Launch Android Auto and run YaMuControl app.

    3. Check more details on GitHub: https://github.com/nikanorov/YaMuControl
